"Ratel":
"Hmm, just what could be up with this place?
Huh? You've been looking for me?"
"So Rasta sent you, did she? I'm sorry if I made her worry. I was investigating these Ore veins, since I was outside the City already."

"As you can see, I'm in no trouble here.
But my partner, though..."
"We split up to investigate, and I lost contact with him."
"Sorry, but could you go and find him for me? He's a man named Rooikat."
"You head towards the Oasis. I'll look somewhere else."
"Maybe he went to the campsite past the Oasis. Could you keep looking? I'm counting on you here!"
